description: This Kotlin source file defines the AuthViewModel class, which manages authentication state and actions by wrapping the AuthManager. It provides methods for login and logout, updating a LiveData Boolean indicator of authentication status.

classes.name: AuthViewModel
classes.description: A ViewModel class that manages authentication state for the UI, wrapping an instance of AuthManager, exposing login and logout methods, and a LiveData for authentication status.

methods.name: AuthViewModel
methods.description: Constructor that initializes the AuthViewModel with the Application context and creates an AuthManager instance.

methods.name: login
methods.description: Attempts login with provided email and password. If successful, updates the isAuthenticated LiveData to true.

methods.name: logout
methods.description: Logs out via AuthManager and sets isAuthenticated to false.
